title: Pets Named After League of Legends Champions!
body:
I've a couple fuzz balls named after League champions, and was curious if anyone else had one (or a few!) 

Pictured: Rengar and Nidalee (the calico).

replies.body: (Arctic ops) Kennen the ferret.

> (Arctic ops) Kennen the ferret.

Awww! :3
One of the kittens my cat gave birth to recently was mute so I ended up naming her after our resident maven of the strings. {{champion:37}}

> One of the kittens my cat gave birth to recently was mute so I ended up naming her after our resident maven of the strings. {{champion:37}}

D'awww! Do you happen to have a picture? :3
Naw, not on me right now and I'd rather not pop the latch and get her out of her basket to take one or else she'll be up for the rest of the night climbing up my back. OTL

Man those kats are ugly. Why do you keep such unuseful pet around that just wastes matter, air, and space? The food that youre feeding to those kats couldve fed a familly of 20 from some 4th world country.

> Man those kats are ugly. Why do you keep such unuseful pet around that just wastes matter, air, and space? The food that youre feeding to those kats couldve fed a familly of 20 from some 4th world country.

0/10 try harder

I can see this getting awkward at times.

"Dammit, Rengar, why didn't you gank for my lane?!"

"mrow?"

"Not you, sweetheart, the other Rengar."

> I can see this getting awkward at times.
> 
> "Dammit, Rengar, why didn't you gank for my lane?!"
> 
> "mrow?"
> 
> "Not you, sweetheart, the other Rengar."

Actually, this has happened a few times. He looks up occasionally when I'm yelling about Rengar in game. xD

I have a pet rock who's name is Malphite :3, whenever I play Malph, I put him right next to me.
His buddy is Maokai, who is a seahorse <3
My family has a Golden Retriever named Jax!
This is Riven. She was a rescue that came with a docked tail, hence her name.

This is {{champion:9}}. My girlfriend did not want me to name him that, but I said it is either Fiddles or fat ass (he is a Flemish Giant so will get about 20 lbs.)....so {{champion:9}} it was. I have had him for about 2.5 months and I still can't get over how big of a rabbit he is! Dudes ears are massive lol.

> This is {{champion:9}}. My girlfriend did not want me to name him that, but I said it is either Fiddles or fat ass (he is a Flemish Giant so will get about 20 lbs.)....so {{champion:9}} it was.

AWWW! :D

I have a whole army ... they're all barn cats, though... and I don't have pictures of them all. There's Jinx, Skarner, Uydr, Meowkai(the three junglers are all siblings), Draven, and Leona(both siblings).

> Meowkai

10/10

> I have a whole army ... they're all barn cats, though... and I don't have pictures of them all. There's Jinx, Skarner, Uydr, Meowkai(the three junglers are all siblings), Draven, and Leona(both siblings).

That... is amazing!
{{champion:60}} My Tarantula :)

> {{champion:60}} My Tarantula :)

You have a tarantula?! What kind? I used to keep several species, and actually kept two black widows named Spindra and Elise. ^-^
People keep black widows as pets?!?

Woah this is a thing? Did you keep antivenom nearby?
What did you feed them?

Do you have pics?

> Woah this is a thing? Did you keep antivenom nearby?
> What did you feed them?
> 
> Do you have pics?

Totally a thing. No antivenom. I actually caught the black widows from the woods near where I used to live.
i named my child teemo.

> i named my child teemo.

satanist

Is your child a designated sacrifice of some sort?

Do you live in Silent Hill?

> Is your child a designated sacrifice of some sort?
> 
> Do you live in Silent Hill?

what no. it  was on sims. 

i would never name real son teemo :D
I upvoted u so that the votes would read "666"
Id Upvote, but im gonna keep it how it is :)
You should try it and see if that global taunt applies.
I named my cat Jax.  The vet thought I named it after the sons of anarchy character but it's Grandmaster at Arms all the way.  I keep him away from all the real weapons.

> I named my cat Jax.  The vet thought I named it after the sons of anarchy character but it's Grandmaster at Arms all the way.  I keep him away from all the real weapons.

I can only imagine the trouble he'd get in if he had a real weapon. ;D
Does your cat have a lamp?
Imagine if he had a real weapon!

I let my girlfriend get a dog but under the condition that I got to name it.  Naturally I named him Ziggs....

 Unfortunately he hasn't stopped laying minefields and ulting my living room.
Ren (aka Rengar) and Nas (aka Nasus bka susan when hes bad) xD

A female youtube gamer LolNatsumiii has a dog called corki :)

Here is a picture of the dork : http://instagram.com/p/vzgQUiPTxr/?modal=true

My neighbors, one of whom is Spanish speaking, have a black cat. They told me his name was (use the Spanish pronunciation here) "Negro". I immediately resolved to call him "Kitty" lest I miss a vowel.

A friend of mine, who also plays League, visited, heard this story, and proposed what in retrospect was an utterly obvious name: Veigar.

http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/143/2/6/unmasked_veigar_by_captaincreate-d66cgrm.png

We learned that the neighbors also have a white cat, whom we have named, of course, Lulu.

http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/116/7/1/lulu_x_veigar2_by_wongkaoru-d4xpm5y.jpg

This is our English Bulldog Lulu.  She is 1.5 years old.  My wife and I were coming up with names and we couldn't agree on any.  I REALLY wanted to name her after a character, and my wife didn't really know any(also she doesn't like the game or me naming anything from video game characters), so I was calm and sly about naming off all the female characters until she said she liked Lulu.  My friends informed her later that she was secretly named after a League of Legends character.  Needless to say she was very upset with me, but loves her nonetheless.
{{champion:150}} is sleeping!
I'll Change my Pug's name to Kog'Maw!!!{{champion:96}}  He's always hungry. :P... ;)
This is {{champion:59}}  his name was originally Shyvanna till we found out it was a boy. :x

> This is {{champion:59}}  his name was originally Shyvanna till we found out it was a boy. :x

Haha, oops! He's so big and cuddly!

I'm planning on getting a big dog for my next pet purchase. I'm going to name it Renekton, just to be confusing.

(Also your cats are adorable and cuddly.)

> I'm planning on getting a big dog for my next pet purchase. I'm going to name it Renekton, just to be confusing.
> 
> (Also your cats are adorable and cuddly.)

I can totally see that name working out well on a German Shepard. xD 

Also, thank you! :3
My dogs name is Reagan but i called him Rengar on instinct (league addiction confirmed) for the first month of having him
I name all my pets Veigar regardless of gender
I have an African Cichlid named Cho'Gath. He pops goldfish like chips and grows bigger every month.

> I have an African Cichlid named Cho'Gath. He pops goldfish like chips and grows bigger every month.

For a second I thought you misspelled child.
My cousin has a dog named Leona.
